titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the fisheries and coastwise trade for the vessel MONTAGUE.

To authorize the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the fisheries and coastwise trade for the vessel MONTAGUE.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the fisheries and coastwise trade for the vessel MONTAGUE (United States official number 1158063).
